output.sentences: Getting ready to graduate after four years of school.
Sitting in the crowd, her family cheers when it's her turn.
Calling her up, the administrator prepares her diplima.
Diploma in hand, she cheers at the advent of her next stage in life.
Celebrating with family, the day winds to an end.
